price: Mola wake Mlezi alipo mwita katika bonde takatifu la T'uwaa, akamwambia:
arabic: إِذۡ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
footnotes: Alipo mwita Mola wake Mlezi katika bonde lilio takaswa, linalo itwa "T'uwa"?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: idh nādāhu rabbuhu bil-wādi al-muqadasi ṭuwan
